casebody.data:
No. 09-931. Kenneth L. Smith, Petitioner v. Michael L. Bender, Associate Justice, Supreme Court of Colorado, et al. 559 U.S. 1086, 130 S. Ct. 2097,

176 L. Ed. 2d 756,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 3132. April 19, 2010.

Motion of petitioner to defer consideration of the petition for writ of certiorari denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 350 Fed. Appx. 190.
